author: cnbc.com
title: Biolase reports 4Q loss
text:
IRVINE, Calif. (AP) _ Biolase Inc. (BIOL) on Wednesday reported a loss of $3.8 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Irvine, California-based company said it had a loss of 5 cents. Losses, adjusted for stock option expense and non-recurring costs, came to 4 cents per share.
The maker of dental laser systems posted revenue of $12.6 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $16.9 million, or 28 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $46.9 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, the company's shares hit 46 cents. A year ago, they were trading at $1.20.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on BIOL at https://www.zacks.com/ap/BIOL
